UGA Mathcamp

Higher math for high school students.

Summer 2015, June 22-26

UGA Math Camp, hosted at the department of Mathematics at the University of Georgia is aimed at connecting high school students in the Athens area to students and faculty in the math department and to actively involve them in exploring topics in higher mathematics.

Registration

Registration for MathCamp 2015 (June 22-26) is now open. We encourage you to complete your registration form by May 1, however we will accept applicants after this date if space is available

A small fee of rougly $40 will be collected before the start of camp to provide for refreshements and pay for some materials.

If you would like to participate in this summer's MathCamp, please fill out the registration form below.
